title: Introduction
description: Brian Holt introduces you to himself, the Complete Intro to React version 6, and what you can expect to learn

title: Pure React
description: Brian teaches React without any frills: just you, some JavaScript, and the browser. No build step.

title: Components
description: Brian teaches React without any frills: just you, some JavaScript, and the browser. No build step.

title: npm
description: When putting any sort of JavaScript project together, npm is an essential tool. Brian talks about how to get started with npm.

title: Prettier
description: Brian talks about his favorite JS tool, Prettier, a tool that that helps you maintain consistent code style with no work on the dev's part.

title: ESLint
description: An essential part of maintaining a project a long time is discipline in coding standards and avoiding antipatterns. ESLint is a great tool that helps you do just that.

title: Git
description: Git is a critical part of any JS project and Brian makes sure you have it set up.

title: Parcel
description: Setting up a build process has historically been a big barrier to entry for most developers. Brian shows you how to set up Parcel which makes the whole process a breeze.

title: JSX
description: JSX is an essential part of writing React. Brian teaches you to leverage your newfound React knowledge and make it much easier to read with JSX
